Key Match Events: Adil Rashid took 4 wickets in 4 overs
Mark Wood and Jofra Archer each took 2 wickets in the powerplay
Oman was dismissed for 47 in 80 balls
England chased 48 in 19 balls and won by 8 wickets
Pre-Game Insights: England needed to win quickly to improve their net run-rate
Adil Rashid was selected to bowl first based on the need to chase a low target
England's quicks flexed in the powerplay to set the tone for the match
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler praised Adil Rashid's performance
England's win secured them a spot in the next round if they win their next match
Scotland faces a daunting task to progress if they lose to Australia
Miscellaneous Highlights: Reece Topley returned to the team after injury
Phil Salt struggled early on, conceding 12 runs in 3 balls
